channel.title: Volunteer Spotlight on O'Town Makerspace

item.title: Volunteer Spotlight: Maria's Story
item.description:
Meet Maria, who has been volunteering with us for over three years and has become an integral part of our community outreach team.

Her Journey

Maria first joined as a student looking to gain experience, but quickly discovered a passion for community service that transformed her career path.

In Her Own Words

“Volunteering here has changed my life. I’ve gained skills, made friends, and found a sense of purpose I never expected.” â€” Maria
